CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 29, 1969, pg. 15, reads: "ART AND CONVERSATION when hand in hand at the Palmer Hayden ehibit. These two couples were among those attending the affair from surrounding communities.  Mrs. and Mrs. Arnold Edwards of Donora, Pa., found a lot to discuss with Dr. and Mrs. Frank Harrison of New Kensington.  Arnold is quite an artist too."
TitMainTitle: Arnold Edwards, Mrs. Edwards, Mrs. Harrison, and Dr. Frank Harrison standing in front of paintings at Palmer Hayden exhibition in University Art Gallery, Frick Fine Arts Building, University of Pittsburgh
